thread.title: Chris Brown Unveils the Cover Art for New Album 'Royalty'
thread.title_full: Chris Brown Unveils the Cover Art for New Album 'Royalty'

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Chris Brown Unveils the Cover Art for New Album 'Royalty'
text:
Comments Unveiled via Instagram, the black-and-white cover photo showed Brown shirtless and cradling his baby girl as her head rested peacefully on his shoulder. 
Chris Brown took to Instagram on Friday, October 16 to unveil the cover art of his new album " Royalty ". Named after his 17-month-old daughter, whom he has with then girlfriend Nia Guzman, the black-and-white cover photo showed the hip hop star shirtless and cradling his baby girl as her head rested peacefully on his shoulder. "#ROYALTY ALBUM COVER," the proud dad captioned the pic. Brown broke the news in August that the title of his new album would be "Royalty". Earlier this week, he confirmed via Hot 97 that the studio album would arrive on Black Friday, November 27. The 26-year-old music star has so far dropped "Liquor" and "Zero" as the first previews of the album. A photo posted by @chrisbrownofficial on Oct 16, 2015 at 12:27pm PDT "Royalty" marks Brown's first LP since " Fan of a Fan: The Album ", a collaboration with pal/frequent collaborator Tyga , came out back in February. Besides, the record becomes his first solo effort since last year's " X ".
